Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.springframework.remoting.support.SimpleHttpServerFactoryBean
    as of Spring Framework 5.1, in favor of embedded Tomcat/Jetty/Undertow
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.springframework.context.annotation.AnnotationConfigUtils.REQUIRED_ANNOTATION_PROCESSOR_BEAN_NAME
    as of 5.1, since no Required processor is registered by default anymore
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.springframework.cache.support.AbstractCacheManager.addCache(Cache)
    as of Spring 4.3, in favor of AbstractCacheManager.getMissingCache(String)
    org.springframework.context.support.AbstractApplicationContext.destroy()
    as of Spring Framework 5.0, in favor of AbstractApplicationContext.close()
    org.springframework.context.annotation.CommonAnnotationBeanPostProcessor.postProcessPropertyValues(PropertyValues, PropertyDescriptor[], Object, String)
    org.springframework.context.support.PropertySourcesPlaceholderConfigurer.processProperties(ConfigurableListableBeanFactory, Properties)
    in favor of PropertySourcesPlaceholderConfigurer.processProperties(ConfigurableListableBeanFactory, ConfigurablePropertyResolver)
    org.springframework.scheduling.config.ScheduledTaskRegistrar.scheduleFixedDelayTask(IntervalTask)
    as of 5.0.2, in favor of ScheduledTaskRegistrar.scheduleFixedDelayTask(FixedDelayTask)
    org.springframework.scheduling.config.ScheduledTaskRegistrar.scheduleFixedRateTask(IntervalTask)
    as of 5.0.2, in favor of ScheduledTaskRegistrar.scheduleFixedRateTask(FixedRateTask)
  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements 
    Annotation Type Element and Description
    org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean.autowire
    as of 5.1, since @Bean factory method argument resolution and @Autowired processing supersede name/type-based bean property injection
